statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics;
SELECT post_id, post_date, likes FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT post_id, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_id, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes >= 50 AND shares < 20;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_id, post_date, likes FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 AND shares < 50 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT post_id, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE comments >= 20 ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_date, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 50 OR comments > 10;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT user_id, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE comments < 50;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id, view_time FROM audience_behavior_patterns WHERE interaction_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audience_behavior_patterns WHERE view_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY likes DESC, comments ASC
SELECT user_id, post_id, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 AND comments < 50
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM social_media_engagement_metrics GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC
SELECT post_id, AVG(likes) AS avg_likes FROM social_media_engagement_metrics GROUP BY post_id HAVING avg_likes > 50
SELECT * FROM audience_behavior_patterns WHERE view_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY interaction_time DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics
SELECT user_id, likes FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100
SELECT post_id, post_date FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT user_id, action_type FROM audience_behavior
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE join_date < '2021-01-01'
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_date, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM audience_behavior WHERE action_type = 'like' ORDER BY action_date DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 101
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE followers_count > 100;
SELECT user_id, likes_count, comments_count, shares_count FROM PostMetrics WHERE likes_count > 50 AND comments_count < 10;
SELECT * FROM AudienceMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_type, description FROM EventLogs WHERE event_type IN ('click', 'view') ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM AudienceMetrics WHERE metric_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes_count, comments_count FROM PostMetrics WHERE user_id = 10 AND shares_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM EventLogs WHERE event_type = 'click' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT username, email, followers_count, following_count FROM UserProfiles WHERE followers_count > following_count;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics;
SELECT id, likes, comments FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT post_id, content, likes FROM posts ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT user_id, followers, join_date FROM user_profiles WHERE followers > 500;
SELECT post_id, user_id, content, timestamp FROM posts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY comments DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM engagement_metrics WHERE comments > 50 AND likes < 200 ORDER BY likes ASC
SELECT post_id, comments FROM engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_profiles.username, engagements_history.action FROM user_profiles JOIN engagements_history ON user_profiles.user_id = engagements_history.user_id WHERE engagements_history.action = 'like'
